description:
"I like girls," AJ said. "Only."
I have to admit I was surprised by his comment. When I first met him I thought he might be gay. I don't know why, really. Maybe it's just a "metrosexual" vibe he puts off.
AJ is 24, 6'3" tall, 170 pounds, and he has a 12 1/2 shoe size.
He's also got a lean, cut body with some clippered chest hair.
He's from the south, and he he has seven siblings, five of which are brothers.
"We're all kind of built the same," he same. "Lean builds run in the family."
All of his brothers and sisters are married, which leaves him the only single one.
"I'm definitely the wildest!" he said...
title: AJ
